questions.question: Keep towels and wipers away from the stove or oven
questions.help_text: Towels can easily get caught on fire

questions.question: Always make sure cooking is attended
questions.help_text: Make sure at least one person is looking after the fire

questions.question: Always make sure there is a fire place in front of a fireplace
Keep lighters and matches out of reach of children
Ensure you have a smoke alarm in every common area
Make sure heaters are turned off after hour

metadata.title: Cafeteria
metadata.description: This fire safety checklist is for the cafeteria building. It assists you to check the safety of kitchen and common areas in this building.
